name: Speech Sprinter
description:
Hi everyone!

My name is Wiandi Vreeswijk and I am a game developer student. I studied the use of speech recognition in game design by creating a small 2D endless runner game. Would love to get your feedback!

TIPS!!
- Wait a few seconds after speaking the "start" command (this issue is currently being analysed)

- the speech commands are: "TRIANGLE", "CIRCLE", "SQUARE"
